column3: san bra EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn nkyɛn ae; na woara w’emumuyɛ dze wo ahwe ase."

column2: "Hom mfa nsɛm nsan mbra EWURADZE hɔ: hom nse no dɛ
column4: na gye dza oye: nna yɛdze hɛn anofamfa bɛyɛ anantwi abɔ wo afɔr."

column2: "Assur renngye hɛn nkwa; yɛrenntsena mpɔnkɔ do nnantsew: eso yɛrennse hɛn nsaano edwuma bio dɛ
column3: Hom nye hɛn abosom: na ɔwo wo mu na egyanka nya ehumbɔbɔr."
mebɛpra me yamu adɔ hɔn: osiandɛ m’ebufuw adan efi hɔn do."

column2: "Mebɛyɛ dɛ ɔbɔsu ama Israel; ɔbɔbɔ nhyiren dɛ esukookoo
column3: na ɔatsentsen no ndwow dɛ Lebanon."
na ne fɛw ayɛ dɛ ngodua

column2: "Hɔn a wɔtse no nwin ase bɛsan aba; wobenya nkwa bio dɛ eburow
column3: na wɔabɔ nhyiren dɛ wenyindua: ne nka bɛyɛ dɛ Lebanon nsa."
Ebɛnadze na menye abosom wɔ yɛ bio? Emi dze
column5: na m’enyi bɛka no ho: metse dɛ kupresi dua frɔmfrɔm; emi mo do na wobohu wo nsowee."

column2: "Woana nye onyansafo a ɔbɛtse ndzɛmba yinom ase? Ɔbadwembanyi a obohu? Na EWURADZE n’akwan tsen
column3: na atseneneefo bɛnantsew do; na mbratofo dze
